title: RipCurl font? Custom or not?
content:
Hi Guys

I'm new to the forum. I joined because I heard this is the place to ask about identifying fonts and working with prints, web-design and such this should be a great place to learn and get help.

I'm looking for the font that RipCurl uses, on their website, in ads, prints etc.  
It might be a custom font, I've searched and asked all my usual places and now here.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413075257im_/http:/typophile.com/files/riprip_4573.jpg)
author: Nate.A

comments.content: ITC Avant Garde with alternate ligatures?
That seems to be the "inspiration". But G and C are definitely not Avant Garde. And there is some Kabel that went into the Es of "SOMEWHERE".
Thanks for helping out guys. Seems we'll have to chalk this up as custom or unknown for now.
